description: This USB memory card reader is the ideal companion for your digital media. Avoid the hassle of carrying a bulky card reader in order to transfer photos, music, data and more between PCs. Compatibility with : Secure Digital: SD, SD Ultra, MiniSD with adapter, MicroSD / TransFlash with adapter. Multimedia Card: MMC, RS-MMC with adapter, MMC Plus, MMC Mobile with adapter, MMC Micro with adapter
title: 10-in-1 USB 2.0 High Speed Black Memory Card Reader Writer for SD SDHC MiniSD MiniSDHC MMC rsMMC
